sources.title: The Case of Polynin
sources.description:
Based on the novel of the same name by K. Simonov. A touching, full of aching sadness, love story of the commander of the aviation regiment Polynin and the frontline actress Galina Prokofieva. He heard her songs and his life changed forever.â€¦

Year of production: 1970

Director: Alexey Sakharov
Screenwriters: Simonov Konstantin, Sakharov Alexey
Composer: Levitin Yuri
Operators: Henry Abrahamyan, Nikolai Nemolyaev
Production designer: Jasyukevich Felix

Cast: Oleg Efremov, Oleg Tabakov, Georgy Burkov, Nonna Mordyukova, Vladimir Kashpur, Lev Durov, Anastasia Vertinskaya, Alexander Khanov, Alexander Porokhovshchikov, Bella Manyakina
